1198920.name: Hordebreak
1198920.description:
Judged guilty by the interstellar courts for a seemingly innocent crime, you are given a hopeless choice: Spend the rest of your life in a high security labor camp, or keep your precious freedom in exile on the fallen planet Kryst. The former colony which was thriving with industry and research until it fell victiom to native monsters and catastrophic genetic experiments. Giant mutant hordes roam the planet surface. Will you be able to found a new home among the rubble, or perish like those before you?

Explore the World

Explore an unforgiving world filled with natural hazards, inhospitable weather and countless enemies. Find locations of interest, gear up for the challenges ahead, and raid the site. Claim the loot and get out before the hordes overwhelm you.

Build Hideouts & Fortresses

Design and construct intricate fortresses providing shelter, resources and tools for your endeavours. Supply it with energy, water and other utilities which are critical to conducting your operations. Establish mighty defensive parimeters, protecting what is rightfully yours.

Craft & Upgrade

Improve your arsenal through crafting powerful weapons, armor and utility gear. Weapons can be upgraded with effects like exploding projectiles or richochet; or why not both for extreme carnage. In Hordebreak you don't measure Damage per Second, you measure Kills per Second.

Online Co-op

Band up with your friends, and explore this unforgiving world together. Travel by foot, or by vehicles of war. Always stick together, or leave the weak behind; the choice is yours.

Modding support

Use the level editor or modify the exposed content XML files in order to create original designs which can be shared with others. Items, hordes and weapons are all examples of game content which will be fully customizable by you and other players.
